game.name: Submarine Titans
game.shortDescription: Submarine Titans is a real-time strategy video game that takes place in the year 2115 after a comet has struck Earth, driving two human factions, the militant White Sharks and the scientific Black Octopi, to establish underwater bases and fight for dominance over the oceans.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Submarine Titans is a real-time strategy video game that takes place in the year 2115 after a comet has struck Earth, driving two human factions, the militant White Sharks and the scientific Black Octopi, to establish underwater bases and fight for dominance over the oceans.

reviewHighlights.text: An OK old school RTS. The controls are a bit imprecise and the art style is uninspired for 2 of the 3 factions, the aliens being the only interesting...
great rts that was ahead of its time, try it out make sure to get the proper update for it i would love a remake of this game maybe with a 4th or even...
